AT.name: 3D Sonic the Hedgehog
AT.description: Der böse Wissenschaftler Dr. Eggman (Dr. Robotnik) hat die unschuldigen Tiere von South Island entführt, um sie in böse Roboter zu verwandeln. Jetzt kann nur noch einer dem Doktor das Handwerk legen und die armen Kreaturen aus seiner Gewalt befreien – der supercoole blaue Igel mit der stacheligen Haarpracht und den Turboschuhen: Sonic! Düse als Sonic the Hedgehog durch sieben klassische Zonen. Um deine Mission zu erfüllen und die Welt zu retten, flitzt du durch Loopings, sammelst Ringe und besiegst Feinde! Zusätzlich zur neuen Präsentation in 3D, verfügt 3D Sonic The Hedgehog™ jetzt über eine Funktion zur Zonenauswahl sowie den klassischen Wirbelsprint - so kommst du schneller durch die Zonen und kannst Badniks ausschalten!

AU.name: 3D Sonic the Hedgehog
AU.description: The evil scientist, Dr. Eggman (aka Dr. Robotnik), has snatched the animals of South Island, turning them into robot slaves. Only one hero can defeat Dr. Eggman and rescue the animals from his vile clutches – it’s the super-cool hedgehog with the blue spiky hair, Sonic! Race at lightning speeds across seven classic zones as Sonic the Hedgehog. Run and spin through loop-de-loops as you collect rings and defeat enemies on your mission to save the world! In addition to its all-new 3D presentation, 3D Sonic The Hedgehog™ now features Zone Select and the classic Spin Dash move to help you zoom through Zones and take down Badniks!

BG.name: 3D Sonic the Hedgehog
BG.description: The evil scientist, Dr. Eggman (aka Dr. Robotnik), has snatched the animals of South Island, turning them into robot slaves. Race at lightning speeds across seven classic zones as Sonic the Hedgehog. Run and spin through loop-de-loops as you collect rings and defeat enemies on your mission to save the world! In addition to its all-new 3D presentation, 3D Sonic The Hedgehog™ now features Zone Select and the classic Spin Dash move to help you zoom through Zones and take down Badniks!

BE.name: 3D Sonic the Hedgehog
BE.description: Dr. Eggman (alias Dr. Robotnik), le savant fou, a capturé les animaux de South Island et les a transformés en robots esclaves. Un seul héros peut le vaincre : Sonic, le hérisson super cool aux piquants bleus ! Élance-toi, rapide comme l'éclair, dans les sept zones classiques avec Sonic. Cours et tourbillonne dans les loopings en ramassant des Rings et bats les ennemis sur ta route pour sauver le monde ! En plus de sa toute nouvelle présentation en relief, 3D Sonic The Hedgehog™ comporte maintenant une sélection de zones et la cultissime course tourbillon pour t'aider à foncer à l'attaque des Badniks !

ES.name: 3D Sonic the Hedgehog
ES.description: El malvado científico Dr. Eggman (alias Dr. Robotnik) ha capturado a los animalitos de South Island y los ha convertido en robots esclavos. Solo un héroe podrá derrotar al Dr. Eggman y rescatar a los animales de sus perversas garras, ¡el erizo más guay con púas azules, Sonic! Viaja a la velocidad de la luz por las siete zonas clásicas con Sonic the Hedgehog. ¡Corre y gira por los bucles mientras consigues Rings y derrotas a los enemigos en tu misión por salvar el mundo! ¡Además de los nuevos gráficos en 3D, en 3D Sonic The The Hedgehog™ ahora podrás seleccionar zona y tendrás el clásico movimiento torbellino, que te ayudará a pasar por las zonas a toda velocidad y a acabar con los Badniks!

IT.name: 3D Sonic the Hedgehog
IT.description: Dr. Eggman, il malvagio scienziato, ha catturato degli animali innocenti da South Island e li ha trasformati in robot-schiavi. C'è solo un eroe in grado di sconfiggere il Dr. Eggman e salvare le bestiole dalle sue grinfie: è Sonic, il porcospino più veloce con gli aculei blu! Sfreccia alla velocità della luce nelle sette classiche Zone con Sonic the Hedgehog. Corri e avvitati nei cerchi, raccogli i Ring e sconfiggi i nemici mentre completi la tua missione! Oltre ad essere completamente in 3D, 3D Sonic The Hedgehog™ ora include Selezione Zona e il classico scatto avvitato che ti aiuta a correre come una saetta nelle varie aree del gioco e liberarti dei badnik!

In addition to its all-new 3D presentation, 3D Sonic The Hedgehog™ now features Zone Select and the classic Spin Dash move to help you zoom through Zones and take down Badniks!

NL.name: 3D Sonic the Hedgehog
NL.description: De gemene wetenschapper Dr. Eggman (alias Dr. Robotnik) heeft de dieren van South Island ontvoerd en in robotslaven veranderd. Slechts één held kan Dr. Eggman verslaan en de dieren uit zijn smerige klauwen redden - de supercoole egel met het stekelige blauwe haar, Sonic! Kruip in de huid van Sonic the Hedgehog en race op razende snelheid door zeven klassieke zones. Ren en draai door de loopings terwijl je ringen verzamelt en vijanden verslaat, in je missie om de wereld te redden! 3D Sonic The Hedgehog™ kent niet alleen volledig nieuwe 3D-beelden, maar bevat ook een Zone Select-functie en de klassieke Spin Dash-actie waarmee je door zones kunt zoeven en Badniks uit kunt schakelen!

NZ.name: 3D Sonic the Hedgehog
NZ.description: The evil scientist, Dr. Eggman (aka Dr. Robotnik), has snatched the animals of South Island, turning them into robot slaves. Only one hero can defeat Dr. Eggman and rescue the animals from his vile clutches – it’s the super-cool hedgehog with the blue spiky hair, Sonic! Race at lightning speeds across seven classic zones as Sonic the Hedgehog. Run and spin through loop-de-loops as you collect rings and defeat enemies on your mission to save the world! In addition to its all-new 3D presentation, 3D Sonic The Hedgehog™ now features Zone Select and the classic Spin Dash move to help you zoom through Zones and take down Badniks!

PL.name: 3D Sonic the Hedgehog
PL.description: The evil scientist, Dr. Eggman (aka Dr. Robotnik), has snatched the animals of South Island, turning them into robot slaves. Only one hero can defeat Dr. Eggman and rescue the animals from his vile clutches – it’s the super-cool hedgehog with the blue spiky hair, Sonic! Race at lightning speeds across seven classic zones as Sonic the Hedgehog. Run and spin through loop-de-loops as you collect rings and defeat enemies on your mission to save the world! In addition to its all-new 3D presentation, 3D Sonic The Hedgehog™ now features Zone Select and the classic Spin Dash move to help you zoom through Zones and take down Badniks!

PT.name: 3D Sonic the Hedgehog
PT.description: O malvado cientista Dr. Eggman (também conhecido como Dr. Robotnik) raptou os animais da South Island e transformou-os em escravos robóticos. Existe apenas um herói capaz de derrotar o Dr. Eggman e salvar os animais das suas garras malévolas: é o ouriço superfixe com o cabelo azul espetado, o Sonic! Acelera a velocidades alucinantes através de sete zonas clássicas com Sonic the Hedgehog. Corre e gira através de loopings enquanto recolhes anéis e derrotas inimigos na tua missão para salvares o mundo! Para além da sua nova apresentação em 3D, o Sonic The Hedgehog™ 3D inclui agora Zone Select (Seleção de Zona) e o movimento clássico Spin Dash para te ajudar a atravessar as Zonas e eliminar os Badniks!

RU.name: 3D Sonic the Hedgehog
RU.description: Коварный ученый, доктор Эггман (он же доктор Роботник), похитил животных с Южного острова, сделав их своими рабами. Только одному герою по силам одолеть злодея и спасти зверей из его цепких лап - суперкрутому ежу с острыми синими иголками - Сонику! Управляя супережиком Соником, пронеситесь молнией по семи классическим зонам игры. Бегите вперед со всех ног, и, сворачиваясь в клубок, преодолевайте головокружительные петли, собирая кольца и побеждая врагов на пути к спасению мира! 3D-версия Sonic The Hedgehog™ получила не только полностью трехмерный вид, но и режим выбора игровых зон. В ней также доступен классический прием - "реактивный клубок", который поможет вам быстрее преодолевать зоны и побеждать роботов-Бэдников.

SE.description: The evil scientist, Dr. Eggman (aka Dr. Robotnik), has snatched the animals of South Island, turning them into robot slaves.
